original_text: We are many people, but all of us eat part of the same loaf of bread. That shows that we are one group of people. We belong together because Christ died on our behalf.
korean_text: 떡이 하나요 많은 우리가 한 몸이니 이는 우리가 다 한 떡에 참여함이라

sentences.original_text: but all of us eat part of the same loaf of bread
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리 모두는 같은 빵의 일부를 먹습니다

sentences.original_text: That shows that we are one group of people
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 우리가 한 그룹의 사람임을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: because Christ died on our behalf
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그리스도께서 우리를 위해 죽으셨기 때문입니다
